hero.subtitle: Welcome to the BYU-Hawaii Alumni Korea Chapter. Connect, share, and grow together.

about.title: About Korea Chapter
about.subtitle: A community of alumni who love BYUH
about.description: BYU-Hawaii Alumni Korea Chapter is a community where BYUH alumni in Korea connect, support each other, and carry on the values of BYUH. We strengthen alumni bonds through regular meetups, networking events, and service activities.
about.detailP1: BYU-Hawaii Alumni Korea Chapter is the official alumni community for BYUH graduates residing in Korea, connecting and supporting each other while carrying on BYUH values.
about.detailP2: We strengthen alumni bonds and support current students through regular meetups, networking events, volunteer activities, and mentoring programs.

events.title: Upcoming Events
events.subtitle: Special moments with fellow alumni
events.noQuestions: No questions added. Only attendance will be collected.

news.title: Alumni News
news.subtitle: Latest news from BYUH and Korea Chapter

join.title: Join Alumni
join.subtitle: Be part of Korea Chapter
join.description: Sign up easily with your Google account and join the alumni network. Access event RSVP, alumni directory, and more.

give.title: Give
give.subtitle: Support future students' dreams
give.description: Your generous donations support BYU-Hawaii Korean student scholarships, chapter events, and alumni program development.

contact.title: Contact
contact.subtitle: Get in touch with Korea Chapter

footer.description: BYU-Hawaii Alumni Korea Chapter. We appreciate your continued interest and participation.
